remarks: Combine ~ ivthicc with ~ evthicc to exactly describe the image of a closed interval.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Feb-2015.)
statement:
evthicc.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
evthicc.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
evthicc.3 $e |- ( ph -> A <_ B ) $.
evthicc.4 $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( ( A [,] B ) -cn-> RR ) ) $.
evthicc2 $p |- ( ph -> E. x e. RR E. y e. RR ran F = ( x [,] y ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d ph x y $.
